name: d100 (W1K, Maybesuweeka)
description:
Dice or Die!

Start as a tiny d3 and feed your way up the "dice chain" to become the apex dice, the d100! Fight dice of your size, avoid those bigger than you, and use items to your advantage to succeed!

Art and co-developer  Suweeka (@Suweeka) / Twitter

ATTRIBUTIONS
Success Jingle sound: Freesound - "Success Jingle" by JustInvoke
Power Up grab/use sounds: wobbleboxx.com
Crunch sound: 7 Eating Crunches | OpenGameArt.org
Cartoon Clock sound: Freesound - "Wood Block Tick Tock (cartoon clock)" by ultradust
